intro_only_event_multi_6th_login/6901_11: It’s clear Red feels like celebrating!

Don’t forget—a Sync Terastal festival is
under way.

Enjoy it to the fullest with Red and
Charizard!
intro_only_event_multi_6th_login/6902_10:
Are you having fun at the festival,
watching us Sync Terastallize?

I have a present for you from Lear.
Here!

The festival’s just getting started! I hope
you get to enjoy it!
intro_only_event_multi_6th_login/6903_10:
I’ve been handing out stones that shine
like Terastallizing, hoping they’ll lead
us to others who’ll expand our world.

This liveliness... It reminds me of the
Harmony Festival, when Mai and I
became closer friends.

Having a space where people and
Pokémon can spend time together gives
us all a chance to grow closer!
